sn46.23:1.1: “Kamaragatthaniyanam, bhikkhave, dhammanam manasikarabahulikara anuppanno ceva kamacchando uppajjati, uppanno ca kamacchando bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati.
sn46.23:1.2: Byapadatthaniyanam, bhikkhave, dhammanam manasikarabahulikara anuppanno ceva byapado uppajjati, uppanno ca byapado bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati.
sn46.23:1.3: Thinamiddhatthaniyanam, bhikkhave, dhammanam manasikarabahulikara anuppannanceva thinamiddham uppajjati, uppannanca thinamiddham bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati.
sn46.23:1.4: Uddhaccakukkuccatthaniyanam, bhikkhave, dhammanam manasikarabahulikara anuppannanceva uddhaccakukkuccam uppajjati, uppannanca uddhaccakukkuccam bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati.
sn46.23:1.5: Vicikicchatthaniyanam, bhikkhave, dhammanam manasikarabahulikara anuppanna ceva vicikiccha uppajjati, uppanna ca vicikiccha bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya samvattati.
sn46.23:2.1: Satisambojjhangatthaniyanam, bhikkhave, dhammanam manasikarabahulikara anuppanno ceva satisambojjhango uppajjati, uppanno ca satisambojjhango bhavanaparipurim gacchati …pe…
sn46.23:2.2: upekkhasambojjhangatthaniyanam, bhikkhave, dhammanam manasikarabahulikara anuppanno ceva upekkhasambojjhango uppajjati, uppanno ca upekkhasambojjhango bhavanaparipurim gacchati”ti.
